General.Name: Finetek Co. Ltd
General.Description: FINETEK Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells display parts in South Korea and internationally. The company offers digitizers, touch key systems, and air-sensor systems. It also provides single process equipment, such as panel loader, cleaning M/C, COG/COF/COP bonding, auto optical inspection and resistance tester, flexible printed circuit, equipment, cover resin dispensers, equipment for 2D print, FOG/FOF/FOP bonding, TFOG, and TFOF; rigid and flexible inline systems, and hybrid inline systems; and electronic shelf label system, an information management solution. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
